channel.title: Free hosting - Virtual Machine/VPS
channel.description:
not even sure if this is suppost to be here, Please guide me to right area if wrong,
just ordered 8GB ram in the mail, im willing to host any type of RSPS server, i can set up a virtual machine with RDP(Remote Desktop) with 2.0GB(Can increase if needed) ram Windows 7 32-Bit/ 10GB Hard drive.(Should be Plenty for 100 slots. ive done 184 on a Single core Pentium 4 with 1gb ram.)
Free 10GB installed Drive, the main drive, about 2GB freespace. ill add another 5GB for free
All NESSASARY PORTS ARE FOWARDED. Let me know if MySQL is needed, i have it set up itll be all up to you what you want to do. Contact me on skype, first come first gets, "Elycin is currently derping", you will see 3 others, ignore them
status: ON HOLD!
Server Specs(FOR THE AUCTUAL SYSTEM ITS RUNNING ON): [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7agwS.png[/img]
Other info: [url=http://imgur.com/a/bybYb#0]http://imgur.com/a/bybYb#0[/url]
Speedtest.net: [url=http://www.speedtest.net/result/1996249957.png]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1996249957.png[/url]

item.title: Free hosting - Virtual Machine/VPS
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Sorry, but you’re not allowed to offer your services like this. If you wish, just join a development team. No need for a thread.

Read full topic
